mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking(bseq, rseq, email, checkin, checkout, bprice, payment, status) VALUES(book_seq.NEXTVAL, #{rseq}, #{email}, #{checkin}, #{checkout}, #{bprice}, #{payment}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT distinct(bseq) FROM booking_view WHERE memail=#{memail} AND status LIKE '%'||#{status}||'%' ORDER BY bseq DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET status=1 WHERE bseq=#{bseq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM booking ORDER BY bseq DESC
SELECT aname ,sum(bprice) as sales_count FROM booking_view where hemail=#{hemail} GROUP BY aname
SELECT * FROM ( select aseq, count(aseq),aname, dense_rank() over(order by count(aseq) desc) rank from booking_view group by aseq , aname order by count(aseq) desc ) WHERE rownum <= 4
